member.name: LIBFLAGS
member.summary: Defines flags that apply to type libraries.

member.name: LIBFLAGS.LIBFLAG_FRESTRICTED
member.summary: The type library is restricted, and should not be displayed to users.

member.name: LIBFLAGS.LIBFLAG_FCONTROL
member.summary: The type library describes controls, and should not be displayed in type browsers intended for nonvisual objects.

member.name: LIBFLAGS.LIBFLAG_FHIDDEN
member.summary: The type library should not be displayed to users, although its use is not restricted. Should be used by controls. Hosts should create a new type library that wraps the control with extended properties.

member.name: LIBFLAGS.LIBFLAG_FHASDISKIMAGE
member.summary: The type library has a disk image.
